data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Talofofo, Guam to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Talofofo, Guam
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Talofofo, Guam.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 6 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Talofofo, Guam need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Talofofo
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Talofofo Village
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Talofofo Village, Talofofo, Guam.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Talofofo, Guam not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Talofofo, Guam a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 493 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
